class.name: kr_qualcomm_interface/SO3CmdToQualcomm
class.description: This take a so3_command and publishes it to the robot using Qualcomm's API

class.name: kr_qualcomm_interface/TRPYCmdToSnav
class.description: This take a trpy_command and publishes it to the robot using Qualcomm's Snav API

class.name: kr_qualcomm_interface/PosCmdToSnav
class.description: This take a pos_command and publishes it to the robot using Qualcomm's Snav API
